comment: Professor Ferguson was extremely helpful in the Proposal Development Workshop. His organized approach and clear guidance made it easier to draft each chapter of the PhD proposal. His feedback was practical and helped improve the quality of our work.
I took higher level class with Dr. Ferguson. He is very helpful.

I took Prof Ferguson for a special topics class. The class was not difficult at all; however, there is a lot of reading that you need to do to complete your assignments. The prof is quite passionate about helping students to move forward, not only in class, but mostly outside of it. Every topic was geared towards using the info outside class.
